statements: SELECT * FROM geospatial_data;
SELECT id, latitude, longitude FROM geospatial_data WHERE altitude > 100;
SELECT * FROM geospatial_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, latitude, longitude FROM geospatial_data WHERE drone_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT id, latitude, longitude, altitude FROM geospatial_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM geospatial_data WHERE latitude > 50 AND longitude < 0;
SELECT id, latitude, longitude FROM geospatial_data WHERE altitude > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, altitude FROM geospatial_data WHERE latitude < 40 AND longitude > -100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT drone_id, AVG(altitude) AS average_altitude FROM geospatial_data GROUP BY drone_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records, MAX(altitude) AS max_altitude, MIN(altitude) AS min_altitude FROM geospatial_data;
SELECT * FROM drones;
SELECT manufacturer, model FROM drones ORDER BY manufacturer ASC;
SELECT max_speed FROM drones WHERE manufacturer = 'DJI';
SELECT * FROM surveying_data WHERE altitude > 1000;
SELECT manufacturer, model, max_speed FROM drones WHERE max_speed IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM drones WHERE manufacturer = 'DJI';
SELECT drone_id, model FROM drones WHERE max_speed > 50;
SELECT data_id, latitude, longitude FROM surveying_data WHERE altitude IS NOT NULL ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT drone_id, manufacturer, model, max_speed FROM drones JOIN surveying_data ON drones.drone_id = surveying_data.drone_id WHERE altitude > 100 ORDER BY manufacturer ASC, model DESC;
SELECT s.data_id, s.latitude, s.longitude, d.manufacturer, d.model FROM surveying_data s LEFT JOIN drones d ON s.drone_id = d.drone_id WHERE d.manufacturer = 'Parrot';
SELECT * FROM drones;
SELECT drone_name, drone_model FROM drones WHERE drone_capacity > 10;
SELECT * FROM spatial_data WHERE drone_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM mapping_projects WHERE project_id = 3;
SELECT drone_name, drone_capacity FROM drones ORDER BY drone_capacity ASC;
SELECT * FROM drones WHERE drone_capacity > 100;
SELECT drone_name, drone_capacity FROM drones WHERE drone_model = 'ModelX';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM spatial_data WHERE altitude > 1000;
SELECT drone_name, latitude, longitude FROM drones JOIN spatial_data ON drones.drone_id = spatial_data.drone_id;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM mapping_projects WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM drones;
SELECT drone_name, latitude, longitude FROM drones;
SELECT drone_name, altitude, battery_level FROM drones WHERE battery_level > 50;
SELECT * FROM flights WHERE area_covered < 1000;
SELECT image_name, image_path, timestamp FROM images;
SELECT * FROM drones WHERE battery_level > 50;
SELECT drone_name, latitude, longitude FROM drones ORDER BY drone_name DESC;
SELECT image_id, image_name, timestamp FROM images WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-10' AND '2022-01-20';
SELECT flight_id, area_covered FROM flights WHERE area_covered > 1000 ORDER BY area_covered ASC;
SELECT drone_name, battery_level, altitude FROM drones JOIN flights ON drones.id = flights.drone_id WHERE start_time >= '2022-01-01' AND end_time <= '2022-01-10' ORDER BY altitude DESC;
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM DroneLocations;
SELECT route_name, route_description FROM DroneRoutes WHERE drone_id = 1;
SELECT map_date, mapped_area FROM MappingData ORDER BY data_id DESC;
SELECT report_date, report_description FROM SurveyReports WHERE survey_id = 5 ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT drone_id, image_date, image_url FROM DroneImages WHERE drone_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM DroneLocations WHERE altitude > 100 ORDER BY latitude DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM DroneRoutes WHERE drone_id = 7 AND route_name LIKE '%forest%'
SELECT route_id, route_name FROM DroneRoutes WHERE route_id IN (1, 3, 5) OR route_description IS NULL
SELECT map_date, mapped_area FROM MappingData WHERE map_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY mapped_area DESC
SELECT report_id, report_description FROM SurveyReports WHERE report_date >= '2022-06-01' AND report_date < '2022-07-01'
